[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1485516797007{margin-top: -75px !important;margin-bottom: 55px !important;padding-top: 81px !important;padding-bottom: 78px !important;background-color: #f2f2f2 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1631648290991{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Through our Proprietary Integrated Artificial Intelligence and Predictive Modeling and Analytics Technology, we deliver strategic, timely and actionable data, insights and business intelligence across all Countries in the world with ease, seamlessness and in real-time. If you hate guesswork in your business strategy, so do we.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1485526502077{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][stm_icon_box style=”icon_left” icon_size=”16″ icon_color=”base” icon_bg_color=”third_bg” icon_width=”70″ title=”Areas of expertise” css=”.vc_custom_1631658748272{margin-bottom: 28px !important;}”]

  • Real-time Employee Engagement Surveys
  • Virtual Teams
  • HR Analytics
  • Policy Research
  • Market Research
  • Social Research
  • Customer Journey Mapping (CJM)
  • Customer Experience Optimization (CEO)
  • Customer Satisfaction Surveys
  • UI/UX Design
  • Mobile & Web User Self Service Portals
  • Competitor Intelligence

[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
